/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades painted in a palette of red, white, and gray, reflecting the urban architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding a serene contrast to the busy street below. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
